user_query: Can you fetch the funding rate history for the symbol BTCUSDT from 1652112000000 to 1652544000000? I'm interested in the funding rates generated every 8 hours. Moreover, retrieve the open interest for the symbol BTCUSD with a recording period of 1 day.

TaskList.description: Fetch the funding rate history for the symbol BTCUSDT between the specified timestamps with 8-hour intervals.
Retrieve the open interest data for the symbol BTCUSD over a 1-day period.
